home.title: Visit Reservation System
home.subtitle: Fast and convenient visit reservation system

process.title: Simple 3-Step Visit Application
process.subtitle: Fast and easy visit application process

step1.title: Register Visit Schedule
step1.description: Easily register your visit schedule and visitor information online.

step2.title: Administrator Approval
step2.description: Administrator reviews and approves the visit application promptly.

step3.title: Complete the Visit
step3.description: Approved visitors proceed with the entry procedure at the scheduled time.

process.learnMore: Learn more about the visit procedure

cta.title: Start your visit reservation now!
cta.subtitle: Follow the fast and easy visit application process.

about.title: About

introduction.title: Introduction to the Visit Reservation System
